description: Logitech Harmony 600 Universal Remote is the universal remote that’s simple to set up and use. Its backlit screen shows the commands you need for the devices you’re using, and can even provide help if you need it. And its one-click activity buttons automatically turn on the right devices and select the right settings depending on what you want to do. It replaces five other remotes and supports 5000+ brands and 225,000+ devices, so you can be confident it will work with what you own today, and the things you’ll add in the future.
title: Logitech Harmony 600 Universal Remote
